lines.text:
[all the men]
Carmen! At your feet we follow you! Carmen! At your feet, we beg of you! Be nice, and tell us the day you will love us! Carmen, tell us the day that you will love us!

[singing in an amazed tone of voice]
"The day that I will love you"? My word! I don't know!
... But NOT today! That's for sure!
